Reviews.Title: “Just fine for what we paid”
Reviews.Author: eguy_1972
Reviews.Content: This place offered us exactly what we needed without any frills. A good ocean view and basic amenities in the condo. We had a 2 BR on the 4th floor. The MBR had a great ocean view. The second bedroom overlooked Coastal Highway. Our refrigerator was missing all its racks but a quick call to Clarion was all that we had to do to get that resolved. We found that if we called Clarion to resolve any issue, they were quick to respond. My one complaint is that the balcony does not have a screen door. Due to this, you cannot enjoy the sounds of the ocean while avoiding bugs. We did not opt for the $30/day linen service but we had ample towels to last us during the stay. We had one minor inconvenience - there was a leak from one of our bathrooms to the bathroom on the 3rd floor. Clarion had to fix this on the 4th floor and we could not use our bathroom for about 2 hours. All in all - a no expectations place.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this place!”
Reviews.Author: cindykarwoski
Reviews.Content: This is a two for one hotel. You have the privacy of a condo but get to use the amenites at the Clarion Resort Fontainebleau Hotel right next door. The staff was extremely nice and helpful when we checked in which was two hours prior to check in time. We rented two 2 bedroom units for the eight of us. Three adults and 5 of our kids (15-21 years old). The units were extremely clean and very spacious. NO BED BUGS! I do not understand why people are complaining about the cooking items in the kitchen. We had everything we needed. If you didn't have enough of something all you had to do was call and ask for them. Of course the items are not William-Sonoma pots and pans but what do you expect. It is a rental unit and often items are taken by guest so it would be ridiculous to expect high end cooking items. I knew I was going to be making pancakes so I brought my favorite skillet with me. I really could have left it home. It was great having the washer and dryer in the unit. Bring your own detergent. Our laundry room had a broom but the other did not. No big deal. I really didn't expect one to be there. The tv in the main room was new. We brought dvds with us and watched them. There was dishwasher detergent for the dishwasher. Bring your own dish washing liquid because that is not supplied. Bring your own shampoo and conditioner because there is only a hotel size of it there which is more than I expected. This is a condo unit and not a hotel unit without maids daily. You have to treat it as a vacation rental. There are two parking spots alloted to each unit. Upon check in go to the Clarion not the Marigot. You really do get the best of both worlds. Privacy of your own condo but service from the Clarion if you want it. Our rooms were 804 and 811. 804 was directly opposite of the elevator and I have no complaints there. We did not hear a thing. You do not hear slamming doors all day and night as you would in a hotel. I would recommend that you book directly through the Marigot and not a privately owned unit. I only have good things to say about staying there. I booked a great deal directly through an internet special on their website months prior to staying. We are from Long Island and it was a great trip. I packed a bunch of food items with us expecting everything to be over priced at the local grocery store. There is one across the street that is very reasonable and easy to walk to. Bring your own cereal. Way to expensive there! Roses is also across the street and is a very good place to buy beach toys and inexpensive beach gear and postcards. I am very happy to give this review and believe me.....we are picky! Thank you to the great staff at Marigot/Clarion Resorts for a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Cleaning in spa area”
Reviews.Author: northclass
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that the hotel has a spa, but I found the hottub area in the spa area to be very dirty. It was covered in mold. It very much needed to be cleaned. The rest of the amenties are very nice. The music is great to listen to at night and I like that there are 2 indoor pools and 1 outside pool.

Reviews.Title: “Right on the Beach!”
Reviews.Author: HappyTravelerInVA
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at a number of east coast beaches and we were leery about staying in the usually overcrowded OC. We usually rent a house but since this was last minute, we decided to go with a condo instead for our family of 8 (ages 17-81). We were in a 2 bedroom condo (not privately owned) and the Clarion Staff was wonderful. We went out for a few dinners but definitely made use of the kitchen. Whatever extras we needed, the Clarion staff provided immediately (larger pots and pans, dishes, glasses, silverware, etc). The rooms were large enough for us to all sleep comfortably. The beach was a few steps from the building, private, life-guard staffed, and not too crowded. A definite possibility for next summer!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible, rude”
Reviews.Author: Aoang
Reviews.Content: Rented the condo and was a horrible experience. Poor service, staff was rude and room was terrible. Room was not clean as expected, dishes from previous rental still in the dish washer and does not look like it is clean and found ants on the kitchen counter, tables and bedroom drawer tops. Floors was not clean. Will never stay at this hotel again...horrible. Not worth the money that I had to pay for.

Reviews.Title: “A very good deal”
Reviews.Author: WholeWideWorld1965
Reviews.Content: As first timers to OC and Marigot, I was a bit nervous going in. I got a great deal on a condo through the internet, and wasn't sure if the place would live up to it's billing. I was very pleasantly surprised. Excellent room, wonderful view, and right on one of the best beaches that I've ever encountered north of Florida. We also ended up liking the location (north of the Boardwalk) because it was pretty easy to get in and out onto the street. But, there was also a lot of shopping and eating places within walking distance. All-in-all, a very good vacation at a very good place.

Reviews.Title: “Always happy here, just a few little details”
Reviews.Author: stjinnova
Reviews.Content: We had one minor annoyance - our room was not ready for more than 90 minutes past the check-in time. I would have just gone to do something else if I had known, but the gentleman at the desk had quoted us 15 minutes when we went to check in, so I waited, and waited, and waited. The room was clean and fresh, we had two reserved parking spots, and the location right on the beach is hard to beat. Nice to have a washer and dryer in the unit for the zillion towels we take to the beach. The kitchen is poorly equipped, however. The tableware is old (and showing its age) and there isn't enough of it. We mostly used disposable. The pools are refreshing, though the outdoor pool is usually pretty crowded. The rooms are remarkably quiet for being in such a busy location. We are return guests and will return again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value in OCMD”
Reviews.Author: Steve920
Reviews.Content: Ocean City is a high demand, and therefore high-priced, locale in the summer. The Marigot Beach condos are a great way to save some money, because you get a full kitchen. We travel to OC with two adults and two kids, so having two bedrooms and three beds is ideal. Once the kids settle down, we sit on the. Along drinking while watching the waves. The condos are located in he quieter part of town known as the Gold Coast, but the boardwalk and Jolly Roger theme park are a quick hop away.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely go back!”
Reviews.Author: stephanie0731
Reviews.Content: Liked the location, room and staff. Only two minor complaints: 1. Doors in room stuck, difficult to open. 2. Kitchen not equipped with enough cups, plates, glasses, etc for 8 people.

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, hotel is far from clean.”
Reviews.Author: Rjarvis812
Reviews.Content: In the one bed the Mattress cover had a yellow stain and other stains. Called front desk and housekeeping come and only wanted to put new sheets on and cover up with another mattress pad instead on changing one on bed. Never received any call from manager about this disgusting find, almost as if this occurs commonly. Nice location but over priced for quality of hotel. Would never stay in this place again!

Reviews.Title: “Summer 2012”
Reviews.Author: TCH1973
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Marigot Beach at least 3 times in the past. This one was not a good experience. When we first entered our room it seemed very clean but in looking near in the living room near the sliding glass door there were dozens of dead moths. I am assuming someone left the sliding glass door ajar and the moths entered but no one cleaned them up. Also the television in the living room was not showing all channels. They sent someone up and he said "as long as there is picture and sound he could not do anything about it". Those items were not that big a deal. Around midnight my mom came in to tell me the ceiling was leaking water in their bedroom onto her and the bed. I called the front desk and they sent someone up. His first concern was the bed getting wet and not the well being of my parents who were sleeping in that bed. We were moved to a different room. So we had to pack all of our belongings in the middle of the night. The rest of the vacation was ok. The customer service here has greatly declined. We will not stay at Marigot again unless they change their customer service philosophy.

Reviews.Title: “Very Disappointed in the room/Need to upgrade”
Reviews.Author: leftylor
Reviews.Content: We ( the10 of us) were very disappointed in the room, we had booked a 3 bedroom condo on the first floor. The first day we got there we had trouble opening up the door the door mechanism was loose so it stuck all the time, I went to turn down the bedding for the night and there was a BIG Black Spider at least 1 1/2 inches big, on my pillow needless to say I was NOT going to sleep in that bed. I called the front desk and they said oh we will send up new sheets, not what I wanted to hear. The rooms were not very cool and the air did not go into two of the main bedrooms thank goodness we brought a fan. The sweeper did not work no bags, and we dropped a glass bottle and it smashed on the floor I called housekeeping and they said they have no sweeper for us to use. they sent someone up with a dirty wet mop to wipe up the glass. Than I went to blow dry my hair and the blow dryer did not work. We than went to make dinner and come to find out we only had 5 forks and a few spoons. one hot pad and NO pizza pan, The fry pan that was there was junk everything we made in it stuck to it. It is a shame because the location of the hotel is perfect but we were VERY disappointed in the room. We would LOVE to book for next year but will be looking at a different hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Changes Made for the Better”
Reviews.Author: sunray1063
Reviews.Content: This is are fourth stay at Marigot Beach. The unit we stayed had upgraded their TV to a flat screen, added new utensils, towels etc. We were able to watch the 4th of July fireworks from the balcony on the bay side and also the ocean side. The indoor pool needs improvement - the water was cold and the hot tub was being repaired. We did use the Clarion's pool (next building) and was enjoyable. Location to beach, view and condo features will have us return next year.

Reviews.Title: “Yuck! Booking room1206 ruined our vacation!”
Reviews.Author: FrequentTraveler70
Reviews.Content: We were so excited for our trip, especially since Room 1206 (booked through Coldwell Banker) boasted 1.5 baths and an Oceanfront view. The only good things about the room were the view and the water pressure. The fixtures are old and 3 of the kitchen cabinets were literally hanging off of broken hinges! The 2 pots/pans were Dollar Store quality and scratched to death. The utensils provided were filthy and bent. The dishwasher looks like something June Cleaver would have owned from the 1950's, and the fridge and shelves were equally as worn and dated. And I thought these units were supposed to be cleaned between tenants!?! We were greeted by a dirty ashtray full of butts on the balcony, there was hair in the shower and crumbs on the floor. And that half bath we were so stoked about was the same size or smaller than an airplane bathroom! The mirror was all chipped up and the faucets leaked. The elevators took an average of 4 minutes to respond to being summoned and the exterior of the building matches the rooms- with old shopping carts offered by management in the lobby as a method to transport your luggage to your room. We dropped over a grand for this unit and will NEVER return!

Reviews.Title: “Family of 6 Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer S
Reviews.Content: We stayed the week of June 11th through 15th 2012. The weather was terrible so we had to spend a lot of time inside. The motel was pretty clean, however, one tub/shower was missing a curtain and the other shower/tub wouldn't drain nor the sink. It was very windy and we did have a beautiful corner room direct oceanfront view. The wind caused the railings to rattle constantly. The were metal and the bedroom I was in had a door to the balcony so we lost lots of sleep due to that. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen was nice. And two bathrooms is great. The living room was small for six people. Loved the indoor pool and location was uptown and pretty quiet compared to where I stayed on 28th st. Boardwalk before. (except the siren I guess it was firemens week?). We had a great time and would come back if railings get fixed. We notified front desk so we shall see. Loved having no daily maid service! Great privacy/safety as well with two locked doors into condo. Will recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Great:)”
Reviews.Author: bbb1965
Reviews.Content: The Marigot was a very nice place for our family to stay. We enjoyed the use of the gym and health spa. Having a fully equiped kitchen was economical.

Reviews.Title: “Memorial Day Condo Stay”
Reviews.Author: Ken M
Reviews.Content: The condo's are a good deal, Ocean Front, we had 2 BR, 2BA, a fully equipped kitchen, dining area and living room. Private balcony with a great view. The building is a bit dated and the units are not luxurious I would call it basic, clean, a little old but functional and good enough to enjoy the beach. Probably my only complaint has to do with the elevator which seemed to be in a constant state of breaking down and being repaired, first one then the other. Very much enjoyed though waking to the sunrise and then the great view from either the balcony or the big picture window in the master bedroom. With full use of the hotel next door, you get two indoor and one very nice outdoor pool - which comes with pool side service from the beach bar. Beach bar is fine for drinks or a lunch although they were a bit slow which I would chalk up to the start of the season. We did not try the main restaurant

Reviews.Title: “WE LOVE THESE CONDOS !!”
Reviews.Author: mommyof5kiddos
Reviews.Content: We take our family ( 2 adults & 5 Kids) Every summer usually over the 4th of July and choose to stay at the Clarion/Marigot Beach Condos.. We Book the 3 Bdrm 2 Bath,. and request a High Floor, So We can Enjoy the View onto the Beach and The Bay !! Breath-taking !! Condos have no maid service But I actually Like not having People coming and going, Its only 1 week so its not hard for us to clean up after our selves. Really Love the fully equipped Kitchen and Laundry area !! If the Ocean is too rough we can choose the Indoor or Outdoor Pool and they also have activities for the kids at specific Days an Times. We LOVE sitting on our Balcony Listening to the Live Music in the late afternoon / Early Evening..Also Everyone at the Front Desk/Hotel are Very Helpful. ~~My only complaint is that some of the Condos could use a little updating an Minor Repairs~~

Reviews.Title: “Repeat Customer since 2005”
Reviews.Author: Yanksansky
Reviews.Content: We are from Long Island, and have always wished we could have a resort like this here. However, since we do not, the Clarion and Marigot Beach Condos are a steal. We get full private oceanfront balcony with full kitchen and laundry room in our 2-bedroom. The rooms are spacious and clean. They however, do not have daily maid service, but since I am tidy, I keep it spotless anyway. The view from the master bedroom has access to the main balcony..total privacy. Full dining area and sofa sleepers in case. Great place. Great hotel services and amenities galore.

Reviews.Title: “The Customer is Always Wrong”
Reviews.Author: krimar
Reviews.Content: Realizing a beautiful weekend was on hand, my daughters and I (they are ages 15 and 17) decided it would be fun to go to the outlets in Rehobeth Beach, Delaware, to shop and then head to Ocean City, MD to stay the night. As it was St. Patrick's Day weekend and there was a convention in town, things in Ocean City were a little booked. We chose the Marigot Beach Suites operated by Clarion for our weekend getaway because quite honestly the pickings were slim. When you arrive, you have to check in at the Clarion, and then drive over to the Marigot next door. We did not arrive until 10:00 after shopping and having dinner, and even though we requested a room on a higher floor or at the very least away from the elevators and called back to confirm it, it was not honored. (We were, in fact, placed right next to the elevator on the 2nd floor.) We were so tired we didn't care and just headed to our room. There were about five or six very inebriated people yelling off the balcony of the Clarion right by the lobby area, whistling at my daughters and unnerving them a bit. We trudged back to the car, got our bags, and headed up to room 204. We have learned from our travel experiences that they very first thing we do is check the room for bed bugs. Bed bugs are NASTY and not something you want to bring back into your home. The girls started to check their room: lifting up the bedspreads to see if there was white powder on the floor near the corners (there was none), blood stains on the sheets, or any bugs. My youngest daughter found a bug right away. After observing it and being a little nervous about it begin a bed bug, we touched it to see if it was dirt or if it would move, and it fell down to the mattress below and disappeared. Thinking perhaps it was just a piece of dirt, we kept looking--and found another one on the other side of the bed, by the headboard. This time, I watched as my daughter put her finger near the bug and it crawled away. We knew for sure at that point that they were both bugs and it was not our imagination. We called down the desk where they told us they would move us right away. So, we had to take all of our things back to the car (in the rain), go back to the lobby where we were again treated to the obscenities of the drunk people, and get a new room. This time we were placed in apparently the only room they had left on the 10th floor. They gave free drink cards to us (this was very helpful for my 15 and 17 year old) and told us that they would definitely notify the manager on the morning shift so that we could possibly receive a discount on our stay or a future stay. They also commented that because a competition with a certain sporting group had been in town, it was very possible the room could have bed bugs because they tend to spread with teenagers who move from location to location to location visiting friends. We went to again to settle in. A thorough check yielded no bed bug sightings, but now my youngest daughter (who found the original bed bugs) was freaking out and nervous. While this room was nicer, we could not enjoy it because it was nearly 11:00 at night and we were all utterly exhausted. By the way: if you do not know this, always keep your suitcases and things OFF the floor unless the floor is tile. We had everything on chairs and counter tops. And, thoroughly wash any clothes you wore as soon as you get home, not letting them touch anything else, just incase there were bed bugs in the bed. The entire checking in, going back, getting a new room, and going to the new room process took about 45 minutes. The next morning, upon checking out back at the Clarion, I asked the desk if the manager had reviewed our experience. She went to get the manager (a tall, thin man with glasses) and he came out and told me that Phyllis the house keeper found nothing in the room, they met their obligation when they moved us, and there was absolutely nothing he could do for us because they couldn't find any bed bugs. He said everyone knows about bed bugs and actually told me because it's in the news I could be making it up. CAN YOU BELIEVE THAT??? I was mortified. Here he is, a manager of a nationally known hotel chain, and he is telling me that he doesn't believe me because they didn't find anything? I am not sure how many bedbugs were in that bed before they changed the sheets, but I figure for the two we saw, there were probably a few more. He wanted me to physically walk back to the room where the bed bugs were located and show his housekeeper where we found them--even though because they didn't find any, he wasn't going to do a darn thing in terms of discounting the room or offering any incentive for a future stay with the Clarion/Mairgot resort. And, I had already told three people very specifically where they were and even offered to draw a map of the bed and show them where they were located. But no--this manager wanted me to go back to the room even though it wasn't going to change his mind about whether or not he was going to discount my stay for the inconvenience. Irregardless, I STILL walked back to the room to show Phyllis where the bugs were, because I knew I was not making it up. What bothers me is because he didn't believe me, he very well might rent out room 204 to someone in the near future--and I did not want someone to get infected because of his arrogance. The room would have to remain vacant for at least two weeks for the bed bugs to not be a problem for future residents. The first thing I noticed was that the bed was already made, meaning that sometime between last night when we had found them and that morning when we checked out, someone had probably already changed the sheets. But, we of course showed Phyllis where they were anyway. No bed bugs were found, but upon moving the mattress, popsicle sticks, trash, and old food was discovered behind the bed next to the wall (it was disgusting.) Phyllis said they'd bring a bed-bug sniffing dog in the room-but I don't know how many bugs need to be present for the dogs to pick them up? We left with a promise to you, the reviewers, to beware. And perhaps if you find bedbugs at your Clarion resort, you better video tape the evidence or else you will be told they don't believe you. Pros to this stay: the location is nice, the ocean views are nice, recent renovations have been done to the Marigot. Free (I think)? wi-fi in the Marigot. Cons: the treatment by the manager (I felt like he was accusing me of making the entire thing up), the security's lack of taking care of the drunk people who were catcalling and whistling at passersby made it seem "cheap" to me. The shades were broke in both rooms. PS--If I had to prove the bedbugs to them, why didn't they come look at them that night before we moved?? Why did they wait until AFTER they changed the sheets and made up the room? I would NOT stay at the Clarion or the Marigot. Find another similarly priced hotel to spend your money. Would you want to stay at a resort where no one who works there listens to you? (No request for room location met, from quiet area to away from elevators; free drink cards great but not for teenagers; manager who tells you unless they find the evidence they don't believe you.)

Reviews.Title: “Fall Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Linda28970
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the serenity of the beach and all the amenities of the Clarion (sauna, jacquzzi, steam room, etc. Apartments were quite spacious. We had a great time. We stayed in three bedroom end units on the 12th floor.

Reviews.Title: “Great get away-dog friendly condos”
Reviews.Author: Cathy R
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at the Marigot Beach Condos. The staff was friendly and very helpful. The oceanfront views of the beach were fantastic! This is a dog friendly hotel - so if you love dogs - then this is an added bonus!

Reviews.Title: “Fall Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Viajero902
Reviews.Content: Escaped to Ocean City for a 3-night stay at one of Marigot's 2 bedroom ocean front condos. The off-season price fit our budget nicely and the weather was still great (late September). Pros: great location in OC away from hustle and bustle; easy access to beach; indoor pools, sauna, hot tub, are an option if weather is bad; great views from our 11th floor condo; cozy balcony; washer and dryer; clean--yet slightly dated--furnishings. More than adequate. Cons: the pathway to the beach and the dunes were littered with some beer cans/bottles and trash...not a lot, but the same trash was there for the duration of our trip; the condo's indoor pool has limited hours off-season, so be prepared to trek next door to the Clarion; NO COFFEE FILTERS! We left ours for the next guests and hope that they do the same.

Reviews.Title: “quick end of summer weekend”
Reviews.Author: Lara O
Reviews.Content: able to rent condo direct ocean at last minute. The view and location were fantastic and the kids were very happy. the condo was roomy, poorly decorated, dingy with stained furniture - yuk. Next time I will plan further in advance and rent hotel/condo more to my liking. Ability to use hotel amenities (restaurant/bar/beach chairs) next door was a plus.

Reviews.Title: “nice location, room dirty and poorly stocked”
Reviews.Author: phil e
Reviews.Content: This is our 6th trip to Marigot (booked with Clarion) and have noticed that the rooms are becoming run down the last two years. The 2 bedroom unit had only four dining room chairs, kitchen poorly stocked (4 spoons, 2 steak knifes, 4 glasses, 3 wine glasses, no blender, few pots and pans), no art decor on walls. The kichen cabinets were dirty along with the ceiling tiles, all the silverware (what few items we had) had to be cleaned. No broom or vacuum in unit, it took several calls and four days before we received. Housekeeping only drops off towels everyday, they don't replenish toilet paper, soap, dishwash detergent or change sheets. We do enjoy the location and convenience to the beach and Clarion, but the management needs improve conditions. We won't be back.

Reviews.Title: “Love the Marigot”
Reviews.Author: CMErhardt
Reviews.Content: This is about the 11th year we have stayed at the Marigot; we love the location and the people are very friendly. The connection with the Clarion adds additional ammenities which is very nice. And we always enjoy the bands that play outside from 4-8.

Reviews.Title: “Was very happy here except...”
Reviews.Author: penguina_11
Reviews.Content: Rooms were pretty clean. Did not like stains on carpet. Wished bedroom was by the balcony instead of open up couch.(we had one bedroom accomodation.) Otherwise was very pleased. Had no trouble getting a cart for luggage, staff was very pleasant. Also there could have been a screen on the door to balcony so I could listen to the ocean!! Balcony had black stains on walls that could be cleaned. Overall, I would say we were satisfied and would go back again!! Kitchen pretty well stocked with pots, pans, ect..

Reviews.Title: “When you can't afford a real vacation, it's worth every penny!”
Reviews.Author: Muziqsnob
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love! This is my favorite place to stay out here in OC. No you don't get the glitz and glam of room service but you get the comfort of feeling removed from the everyday nuisances. Nothing like stopping at the grocery store and fully stocking your real kitchen. It's a true getaway! Getting to sit on your balcony with a glass of wine as the sunsets. The best part is sitting on the bed in the master bedroom (try and get a high floor) and looking out your huge window (the size of a wall!!) just lost in the ocean. All you see is the beautiful ocean and it feels like you're floating on it. <3

Reviews.Title: “OMG! SHAMEFUL!Don't waste your money.”
Reviews.Author: Brina2blu
Reviews.Content: If youre looking for a dirty run down, old and raggedy, that's the place to stay. For all that money, they are to be ashame. We stayed on 8/18-8/21rm1004. I called for clean sheet, spoke to Magarita from front desk; I kid you not, clean sheets never arrived. Maintenance had to service the unit, after I complained; these this should not be. After I arrived and astonished it prompt me to view the reviews on the Marigot, trust me I wish I had done my homework prior to booking this reservation.Don't WASTE your hard earned money on that dump!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect unit for a week in OC”
Reviews.Author: TomP882
Reviews.Content: Marigot Condominiums come in two flavors. There are units owned by the Clarion next door and their are individually owned units. We stayed at an individually owned unit #806, rented through Coldwell Banker. The grounds and maintenance for the complex appear to be in the hands of Clarion. The grounds are well kept, the indoor pool and hot tub well maintained. Our unit was a one bedroom, clean, with all the accoutrements needed for a peaceful vacation. The bedroom has a king bed, new mattress. There was a pull out queen in the living room that was not used. One assigned parking spot per unit. Price varies based on time of year. I would recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: “The room was good size for our group, but I wouldn't stay again...”
Reviews.Author: Lacy M
Reviews.Content: The room was a great size for our group for the bachelorette party. There are a couple of things, however, that we were disappointed about: -One of the showers did not have a curtain when we arrived. We did request one and had it within 20 minutes. -After about 5 minutes in a shower, the water turned cold. -We called down to ask for a proper corkscrew, because the one in our room did not have the handles and would not open our bottle, and we were told that we would have to walk over to the Clarion with the bottle, and someone would open it for us...That's not customer service. -The check-in area at the Clarion is in an odd place. Rather than in a parking tunnel, why isn't it at the main entrance, where that conference center is? It's confusing. Every single guest I saw coming for the first time walked up to the conference center and became confused about why the door would not open. Of course, there are signs, but only if you're on that side of the building already. -Parking is pretty difficult...When we arrived, we had to put our cars in the Clarion parking lot to check in because our room wasn't ready--or we'd be towed from the Marigot lot (understandable). The problem is, however, that when you go to move your car from the Clarion to the Marigot, you have to get back out on Ocean City Blvd and make 2 U-turns to get there! That's a lot of effort just for your guests to be able to check-in and move in to the room. Additionally, our room comes with 2 parking spaces: one conveniently close to the building and one VERY far away in that lot. Regardless of how many cars a group has, they ALL contain luggage that we have to haul. This became an issue when unloading and reloading. I was fussed at for having my car in a spot other than my assigned--for about FIVE minutes--but where else can I put my car to load it, when all the loading zones are full already!? I understand that the spots are assigned for a reason, but do you really have to put them so far away and then fuss at guests about moving them closer for their convenience? The woman was borderline rude and not understanding about our loading situation. -I expected a pamphlet or at least a piece of paper saying "Welcome to Merigot, we appreciate your business. Here are some things you should know..." There wasn't anything like that. -Overall, I just didn't feel very welcome or like our business was appreciated, and we spent over $1100 for 2 days... -Almost every single lady at the front desk in the Clarion seemed annoyed at the guests, and I barely got even a smile. Only when we left did I hear a "have a nice day!" -The ice maker in our freezer did not produce ice... -We had to walk over to the Clarion for ice, where they gave us a tiny little baggy to fill up. We had to go to 3, 5, & 7 to get an ice machine that worked in combination with a drink machine that worked. That's just ridiculous...And the stairwell in that building is gross. You might consider cleaning it up... -You may consider painting the outside of the buildings too. It can't compare to the surrounding hotels, and I would rather try to get a room in a nicer looking place next time. So, overall, we were disappointed. The room itself seemed to serve our purposes well, after we had the ice and the shower curtain--and other than taking cold showers. There were 8 of us, so it was nice to have the space. I wish I had better things to say about the room. It by no means dampered our trip, but I thought I would share my honest experience. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Thank You”
Reviews.Author: Michelle E
Reviews.Content: First let me thank you for accommodating our request to be next to my family. That worked out great. Our room was very nice but my only suggestion is for the kitchen. There needs to be more plates, bowls, glasses, storage bowls and pans. This is my second time at your condos and I would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Our third time staying here.”
Reviews.Author: Brent_LS
Reviews.Content: This was the third time we stayed at Marigot Beach. This time was a bit disappointing compared to the last two years. We stayed in a one bedroom condo. It had older tube TVs in it (the one we were in last year had flat screens) and one of the remote controls didn't work. Some of the bathroom fixtures were falling apart. The air conditioner in this unit was also extremely loud when it first came on. We still enjoyed our stay, the location is nice, not too crowded on the beach, even in August. We like the outside pool at the Clarion for our small kids, since it has a very shallow area for them to play in.

Reviews.Title: “An OK Place”
Reviews.Author: cahenicle
Reviews.Content: We arrived in 106 degree heat ay 2:30p.m. and were not permitted a parking space until 4:00. We were told that cleaning wasn't finished and weren't allowed to give us our parking space until we were registered in an hour. Ridiculous!!!! The condo view on the website is not what you find when entering our reservation. Stains, bare walls,rust,etc.is what greeted us. Key cards/door were difficult to open. The first night a window on the bayside was opened from the outside which scared us. Security did come quickly. Windows should be checked after each guest has departed.

Reviews.Title: “3rd time here and we will keep coming back!”
Reviews.Author: Strangefruit21
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd summer we have stayed at Marigot Beach Condos... All the units are beachfront - which is wonderful. It is just a short walk right to the waves...But more importantly - for a family of four - is the full sized kitchen and washer and dryer. We save so much money by shopping at the nearby grocery store and eating 90% of our meals in the rooms... The washer and dryer ensure clean and dry towels and swimsuits daily - no worry about having to put on sandy, damp swimsuits the next day. The facilities are clean and well stocked. I have recommended Marigot Condos to other family members... it makes doing Ocean City easy.

Reviews.Title: “Will never stay at condo 101 again”
Reviews.Author: copenhagenOdenton
Reviews.Content: The kitchen was very dirty, the utensils had to be washed and the pots&pans was so disgusting we never used them, they must have been 20years old.Had to clean the battubs before using. Day 2 there were ant everywhere , they came an sprayed, the last day the washer leaked, water all over hallway, a guy came to fix it but he needed a part, he never came back. So we ate a lot in your restaurant and its was great food with very nice and helpful people.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: wckris
Reviews.Content: We were upgraded to a 3 bedroom. It was great, bay view balcony was spectacular. Unfortunately the unit was not equiped for the seven of us, even though it is supposed to sleep 10. Not enough plates or silverware and we were very disappointed by the apartment size washer and driyer, we could not even wash all the towels in one load. Last year we had a 2 bedroom and it had a full size washer. Over all we love this place the amenities at Clarion are top notch. The gym is awsome for a hotel! We will definetely be back.

Reviews.Title: “I will never go back”
Reviews.Author: bird1019
Reviews.Content: The hotel side is nice but the condo suck it's dirty and the cleaning crew don't clean good at all in fact we never seen a cleaning crew and we was there for a week. we found old noodles under the bed the tub and rug was not clean we clean it. The refrigerator did'nt work some of our food went bad by the time they replace it the place is in need of a deep cleaning we had to wash the towels they gave us because they don't give more towels unless you pay more. they get you already with the fee they tax you everyday you stay 10.5% a night that's 6% state sales tax and 4.5% occupancy tax and tax my deposit. and the board walk is to far to walk and thats were the fun things are near

Reviews.Title: “Old facilities, great location”
Reviews.Author: Lgadd
Reviews.Content: I went for a conference at the Clarion; however, my family stayed with me for a vacation at the same time. The facilities are old and need updating and repair. However, all of the condos are ocean front with ocean front balconies which is great! Our air conditioning unit was replaced twice during our stay due to it being old and breaking down. I called for towels two days in a row ( you call the Clarion) and never received any towels or a response. Luckily there is a washer & dryer in the room. I would never pay the kind of money they are asking for this place if it wasn't part of a conference. It is nice to have access to the Clarion facilities and three pools.

Reviews.Title: “summer get away”
Reviews.Author: suz8044
Reviews.Content: The condo was wonderful. It had all the ammenities and more. I loved the fact that we could sit on our balcony during happy hour and hear the band. The condo was very clean and I really need a washer and dryer with kids. It was perfect!

Reviews.Title: “If you're looking for dirty, rundown rooms, and filthy linens, this is your place!”
Reviews.Author: MDR1974
Reviews.Content: Having stayed at Marigot a number of years ago and enjoyed my time there, I decided to book again for an impromptu trip this past week (April 2011). I was extremely disappointed to find that the accomodations this time around were less than satisfactory. While the staff at the front desk was above average, the accomodations were extremely lacking. The rooms were run down and old looking. The linens in all of the bedrooms smelled of cigarettes and/or cologne. Scuffs on the wall made the condo seem like a room rented by the hour for $20 as opposed to an overpriced oceanfront condo rented daily for almost $300. Room service (breakfast) on our departing day was served in styrofoam containers and a plastic bag! Should you have other options for your OCMD stay, I highly recommend that you exercise them!

Reviews.Title: “Great location and size of room but needs more kitchen supplies”
Reviews.Author: tara631
Reviews.Content: Spent three nights over presidents weekend at the Marigot in a 2 bedroom condo. Check in was easy. A requested crib was already in the room. The size of the condo was great for a family of 4. The kitchen was not well supplied. There were plenty of cups and plates but only one scratched up pan and only 1 quart pots. There wasn't even a colander. The rooms were clean but are in need of some updating. The location is off the boardwalk but was great. It was easy to walk onto the beach and play with the kids. The sunrise was breathtaking. The pool at the condo was great and not crowded. The fitness center and pool at the Clarion were great.

Reviews.Title: “Great View”
Reviews.Author: MarsOrbiter
Reviews.Content: The 2 bedroom units have a large picture window in the master bedroom overlooking the beach and the surf. Wonderful to wake up to a view of the sunrise, or look out on the moon-lit water at night. Balcony access from the bedroom or living area. Heated indoor pool, and use of facilities at the Clarion hotel next door. Pricey in season, but we got a great deal just after the MLK holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed after 20 years”
Reviews.Author: locorigs
Reviews.Content: My friends and I have been staying here for over 20 years for our yearly reunion. We have stayed in different units and understand that some will be decorated or equipped better than others. What we didn't expect were the flies in the unit and gnats. Killed 9 flies upon arrival -- 5 in the bathroom and 4 in the living room/dining area. When we complained, we were offered another unit but chose to stay. Staff gave us some insect spray. There was also no screen on the doors leading to the balconey. The furniture was nicer than we have had. All the applicances worked. Other than the flies and gnats, the unit was clean. Housekeeping was prompt and efficient. Despite the insect issue, we will return to Marigot Beach for our reunion. We would suggest that when the unit is being prepared for guests, housekeeping should check for insects and take care of the problem before arrival. There is no way someone could have missed seeing as many flies as we had.

Reviews.Title: “Old but great view and location!”
Reviews.Author: cheerio0o0o
Reviews.Content: This is definitely not a super nice or impressive hotel...but the ocean view from the balcony is spectacular! I also love the location. Being on the Boardwalk was important when I was younger but as an adult I now I enjoy being farther away. The beach is not overly crowded in this area and it is also very clean! The hotel also does have a lot of great amenities, including an indoor and outdoor pool, a great gym and a tiki bar. Overall, my stay was a great experience!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place right on the beach, good value.”
Reviews.Author: brettlc
Reviews.Content: Marigot Beach may not be fancy, but the kitchen is decent, the view is fantastic, and the rooms are fine.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to vacation for our family of 5.”
Reviews.Author: djf123
Reviews.Content: It was a great location, very easy to go down to the beach at any time. The beach was very nice, and at the end of August / beginning of September it wasn't crowded at all, since the schools had started already. We were in a two bedroom condo, which worked well for our family. The living room could perhaps have been a little bigger, but it was ok. The vacuum didn't work, and there wasn't a broom, so it was difficult to clean up the sand that got tracked in, but the condo was well cleaned to start with. These are pretty minor complaints. We had a great vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious Unit That Merits a Good Rating”
Reviews.Author: Lisie610
Reviews.Content: Positives: Great ocean view and it is lovely to have a master bedroom directly oceanfront. Privately rented the unit and it was clean, comfortable, reasonably updated, not overly decorated with a fully stocked kitchen and electric stove. There was enough seating and 2 shower/bath bathrooms with decent water pressure. All appliances and the air conditioning worked well and it was great to have a separate laundry room with full sized washer/dryer in the unit. Lots of dollies for loading and unloading suitcases. Security personnel are friendly and knowledgeable and directed us to great place to watch the fireworks. Negatives: Free wi-fi worked intermittently because there were too many users sharing the connection. The bedroom window needs to be washed from the outside and the building could stand to be painted. Waiting for elevators can be a long hot experience. The Marigot pool and hot tub had way too many chemicals. We didn't use the Clarion pool because twice in the same week, a child dropped a deuce. The Clarion bar food and drink is pricey. The live music from the Clarion is beyond annoying and it plays every day beginning at 4pm. Being next door to the Clarion is a complete negative.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: kimoling
Reviews.Content: Had a great week in Ocean City! Condos were relaxing, convenient for parents w/ young children and lots to do(beach, pools, amusement parks, boardwalk, boat rides) Looking frorward to next year...same time, same place! Very affordable!

Reviews.Title: “Worth the price”
Reviews.Author: Tank354
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at Marigot Beach going on 4 years now and have never been disappointed. Initially the price may appear a little high, however when you consider all the amenities at the Clarion, it's well worth the price. Ocean Front Units, 3 pools (2 indoors), live music on the outdoor Deck with good Bar Food. Very Good Service as well. The Units are clean and updated. Full size Washer and Dryer and a full Kitchen, 2 full Baths, you can't go wrong. On our last visit the Water Heater in the unit began leaking, one call to the desk had maintenance personnel on scene and aside from being inconvenienced for a couple of hours, a new one was installed before the rest of the gang came off the beach for showers. I will be returning in September and would recommend Marigot to anyone looked for a great vacation in OC.

Reviews.Title: “had a great time”
Reviews.Author: maile_bird
Reviews.Content: The 2 bedroom condo was great. Nice location and the balcony overlooking the ocean is wonderful. The TV in the master bedroom could stand to be replaced is about the only negative. It would be nice if dogs were allowed like the hotel next door allows

Reviews.Title: “Encourage the city to prohibit sale of green laser lights!!!”
Reviews.Author: maryland_traveler53
Reviews.Content: This was our third year staying at this hotel. It was difficult to enjoy the beach after dark this year because of the green laser lights on the beach at night. They're a potential hazard to vision and the sale and use of them should be prohibited. This is a problem all over Ocean City this year. We had a problem with the lock on our door and shortly after I reported it, the entire lock was replaced. We felt like the other guests were a lot noisier this year. There was partying in neighboring condos till 2am each night. We never complained about the noise. There seemed to be a lot more young people in the building this year and less families. I wish there was some way of changing that in the rental process.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: Brent_LS
Reviews.Content: This was our second time staying at Marigot Beach. We stayed 5 days last year and 7 days this year. We have two children aged 3 and 1, so having a fully equipped condo works really well for us. It's nice to be able to eat most of our meals right in the condo and not have to go out for every meal. This year, we booked a 1 bedroom condo, but for whatever reason ended up with a 2 bedroom. While we didn't actually use the second bedroom, the extra space was nice and having our bedroom window facing the beach was great. I think we'll book a 2 bedroom next year. All of the condos have balconies facing the beach which is something I always want to have. There were flat screen TVs in the living room and bedrooms and the wireless internet is nice to have (although it was out for a good bit the first day we were there). The place was perfectly clean when we got there. When you stay at the Marigot Beach condos, you have access to the pools and restaurant at the Clarion next door. We did not eat there, but we did use the outdoor pool. I have no problem highly recommending Marigot Beach and we will be staying there again next year.

Reviews.Title: “For the price, the condo was very comfortable and convenient.”
Reviews.Author: billie001
Reviews.Content: Not the fanciest place in Ocean City, but definitely the best value for the money. I did tons of research and was very pleased with the condo. Everything was surprisingly updated, the kitchen had granite and new appliances and was very clean. For the cost, I expected the condo to be a little more rundown, but we all were pleasantly surprised. The beds were also relatively comfortable (nobody woke up with a sore back). I would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Stay here if you can't find anything else”
Reviews.Author: deva001
Reviews.Content: We came here my family of 4 and 2 grandparents. Our stay was okay. No amenities, we used the pools in the Clarion. The view is nice if you like beachfront. Remote to TV doesn't work, kitchen is not stocked up we needed a fry pan and they bought us a dirty one so bring your own supplies. Window in the master bedroom is dirty. Closet door is broken. Sliding glass door is broken. The place was full of flies. Dirty silverware. refrigerator was not cleaned up. House keeping is not up to par. Black stuff in the tub. Parking is crazy...numbered parking spaces but not in order. Dryer in the unit works sometimes. You will be drying clothes all day.

Reviews.Title: “CLEAN, COMFORTABLE AND AND LOTS OF OPTIONS”
Reviews.Author: 2010vacationer
Reviews.Content: We had (2) 2 bedroom condos for our extended family vacation. Even with 2 small children, 3 teenagers, and 7 adults, everyone had lots of room. The condos were nothing fancy, but they were clean and had a great view of the ocean and beach. The 2 bathrooms made it very nice with so many sharing a condo. With two indoor pools, an outdoor pool and the beach there was always some place to cool off. The only "problem" we ran into was the limited cooking utensils, pots and pans. We could have used at least a skillet or nonstick pan. But if that's the biggest downfall, it still rates well with me. I was concerned about some of the reviews I read before going, but we had a very enjoyable time and would definitely go back. We booked early, went early in the season and got a pretty good rate compared to other places we checked with less amenities. The prime rib and seafood buffet at Horizons was excellent also! Unfortunately with the small children, we didn't get to check out Lennys beach bar and grill as much as we would have liked to!

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY”
Reviews.Author: AmberNicole83
Reviews.Content: I was completely disappointed with the Marigot. I stayed there fours years ago and had a very pleasurable experience. However, since then, the hotel has gone down the tubes. When I arrived at the Marigot check-in went ok. When I got up to our room I was completly disguested. The furniture was all stained and the walls were a mess. The floor had sand on it. I went down to the front desk and they offered to give me a new room. I went to look at the other two rooms and they were weven worse then the room I was first given. So we kept it. After unpacking I went grocery shopping. When I came home to unpack I noticed the kitchen was missing, well...everything. I had to run back out and get cups, plastic bowls, and such. I did however call the front desk and they brought me a coffee maker. So after that I proceeded to clean our room. I wiped the walls, cleaned the curly hair off the toilet and put towels on the furniture. Luckly, I brought extra towels because I was informed they only provide one set. The next morning I awoke to find ants everywhere. There were four in my bed and everywhere in the kitchen. They were in the dishwasher and crawling out of the carpet border on the walls. It was so gross. I called the front desk and they were supposed to send someone up and they did not. I went out and had to buy ant traps and spray. My son was afraid to sleep in his bed after that. When I complained I was told there was nothing they can do. If my money would have been refunded I would have just left. But to throw $2000 away, I could not do. They could have offered two seperate smaller rooms(if they were cleaner), a discount, something. It just shows that all they want is your money. Needless to say, I will never go back.

Reviews.Title: “Old Building and it Shows”
Reviews.Author: CTTravelBug
Reviews.Content: As so many negative comments about Marigot Beach Condos state, these units need a lot of work. The building is located just steps from the sand but it is 25 years old and looks it. Thank God we didn't pay the high prices listed on their website. Otherwise I would have felt even worse about the $$ spent here. We booked through cbvacations.com (Coldwell Banker), thanks to a mention I saw on tripadvisor.com. (You pick up the keys at the Coldwell office) Then try to find the correct parking space; they are not in numerical order. As mentioned in other postings, the inept use of bromine chemicals and limited hours in the indoor pool/hotub area virtually mean you don’t get to use what you paid for. After complaining to management, we were allowed to go to the Clarion Fontainebleau Hotel next door to use their spa without the paying the extra charge. But who wants to do that more than once during your stay? As everyone on tripadvisor says, depending on the unit, the carpeting maybe stained, the sliding door to balcony will be off-kilter, there is no shower in the tiny master bath, the AC unit in the closet is loud, the balcony outdoor furniture is minimal and you will spend a lot of time waiting for the elevators.

Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: babytravelerNepa
Reviews.Content: We went to the Marigot thinking it would be really nice. We have a 6 month old son and he loves to swim so we were excited they had an inside pool in the condominium side. We get there and it is closed all week and only open on Friday and Saturday?!? The least thing they couldv'e done was told us our pool is closed all week. I called an complained and they said you could use the Clarion pool... with a 6 month old walking over there- not fun. Then the walls in the room was FRP board. FRP board is used in the restaurant business so that it is an easy way to clean the walls. Horrible. Never again will we stay there. Dirty also

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again.”
Reviews.Author: BobbiJoPennsylvania
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a three bedroom condo-steps from the beach. Plenty of room. Full kitchen. Pool hours were limited-off-season.

Reviews.Title: “Marigot”
Reviews.Author: saillakeblue
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd stay at Marigot and it will not be our last. The 2 bedroom condo met all of our expectations. We love having the hotel Clarion's amenities available to us while being able to have a place with an ocean facing balcony, 2 bathrooms, full kitchen, washer/dryer, tv's in all rooms and CLEAN! Our ratings of Cleanliness and Service would move to Excellent if both properties improved their pools' clarity and cleanliness. We hope to have our extended family start vacationing with us since Ocean City MD and Marigot is now our yannual trip to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Okay by me”
Reviews.Author: Katiebug2009
Reviews.Content: These condos must be hit or miss, but I definitely had a hit. If you are looking for comfort, privacy and value in OC, I would take a hard look at the Marigot. I booked in Jan. There were 2 couples. Split down the middle that's about 360 or so apiece. We stayed 8/16-19 in a 2 bedroom 2 bath unit. The appliances were nice, washer and dryer nice, had all the cooking utensils I needed. Even the bed was comfortable. The only bad part was that the bedrooms tended to stay warm though the unit was cool. For entertainment it was a great spot.. The beach steps away, Lenny's featured the outside band, On the Edge that week and they were awesome, The group Arizona had the club inside in the evenings. We did not have far to go for a great time. I rely a lot on research and the reviews before I book.. In this case, I wasn't quite sure what to expect, it seemed to be 50/50. However, I lucked out and we had a condo o the 11th floor. The view was spectacular. They even managed to bring us up 2 more chairs, so we could all sit on the balcony. The furnishings were older, but, decent, my unit was clean, If unsure, I always carry my handy disinfectant. We were not ready to leave when our time was up. I did hear some complaints, while there. If the Clarion looks into those complaints and continues to update and repair the units when brought to their attention, they will be a sure winner. We had everthing we needed..room, privacy, great view, entertainment, convenient to grocery stores, etc. We were quite happy in the condo.. Would I try my luck again?, most definitely. For us, the value, location and price was a great. So, Clarion, keep moving forward, do what needs to be done, so every unit will be a hit. I know my unit was okay with me!, I can't wait to return someday.

Reviews.Title: “It was a wonderful vacation”
Reviews.Author: mwcagan
Reviews.Content: We had a great time. The condos were a terrific value for what was included and we are planning to return next year.

Reviews.Title: “Marigot EXCEEEDED EXPECTATIONS!!!”
Reviews.Author: AMcgConneticut
Reviews.Content: I have had success with the hotels/condos etc. that I have chosen with the help of Trip Advisor. I try to make sure that at least half of the reviews are decent but I do read the negative ones too. In the case of Marigot which my family and I just loved (we had a very large 3 bedroom with a magnificent ocean view and a nice deck,my husband had concerns with some of the negative comments and I was in touch with the wonderful, manager, Mark. In any case, we were extremely happy with the Marigot . If you go to their website you can take a virtual tour of the condos and they really do look like what is shown. The entire staff at the Marigot and the adjacent Clarion Hotel where you are entitled to their wonderful amenities all are very hard workers and very pleasant. I bring this up because I feel that some of the problems people encounter could easily be solved if they just ask for help. Last Sunday I asked one of the nice gentleman who cleans the rooms for something which he brought to me later that day and he was so apologetic for taking so long...but their staff had to get over 40 condos cleaned within a five hour period when new groups of people would check in. We all know we want to check in at the designated time and not a minute later. If you get to your condo and something is not as clean as you would like it (ours was) or if you do not have enough coffee cups etc. call guest services and I am sure they will be happy to help you. If you decide to reserve a condo here and I hope you will be as happy as we were. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “We would not stay here again - not worth the money one pays.”
Reviews.Author: snowvt
Reviews.Content: This 1 room condo needs remodeling and sound-proofing! The unit is LOUD from the back to the front between the old air conditioning unit, the pipes in the walls, being right on top of the outside showers and deck, etc. we never got a good night's sleep. There was a disgusting little table on the deck, no coffee maker, and when one was brought it was dirty and broken - no one did anything until I insisted on speaking to a manager and he (Mark) took care of it swiftly. I don't know who up-keeps the kitchen but some more tableware and updates would be helpful - a serving tray perhaps? Some serving bowls? As owners of a vacation ski condo and Miami Beach condo we were surprised at the low quality and quantity provided. Also, if this is a Clarion resort why is one not awarded Choice Priv. points? This makes no sense what-so-ever. In summary - it's an old building and it shows. We would definitely stay somewhere else if we returned to OC.

Reviews.Title: “A stay at one of our favorite resorts that could have been a little better.”
Reviews.Author: rammer67
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Marigot Beach condo for at least the last 5 consecutive years and prior to that the Clarion/ Sheraton since 1992. My wife now of 15 years and I went on our first away trip together for Valentine's day weekend in 1992 and stayed at the then Sheraton Fountainbleu. The resort has always held special memories for us and we now return every year with our 2 girls so they may come to know the resort too. With an expanded family, staying in the Marigot Beach condos has been a great way to have the space we need in the room, with all the amenities of the Clarion Resort. This year, the staff was friendly, courteous and provided great service. We were especially impressed by the African American man from the beach stand who set up our umbrella and chairs everyday and Ashley who delivered our drinks and lunch on the beach. The food was great and the entertainment enjoyable. Our kids look forward to the body painting at the pool every year and thought the addition of the outside pool was a big plus. The only negative feedback on the trip (aside from I wish I could have stayed longer!) was that some of the amenities in the Marigot room have grown tired. The coffee maker was on its last legs, the stove did not heat evenly and the air conditioner filter has clearly not been changed in a long time and the extra loud unit constantly ran as it struggled to cool the air. Perhaps the biggest drawback was the mattresses. Both my wife and I left the resort with aching backs. If the mattresses in the Marigot are not refreshed, it will give us serious reason to consider trying another option. Overall, the best resort in Ocean City, but money needs to go into the maintenance of the condo option to keep us coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Never stay here again”
Reviews.Author: OhioTeachermom
Reviews.Content: We would not stay here again as we visit OC every year. The condo was extremely dirty. The matress on the king size bed did not have a fitted sheet and the mattress itself had a blood stain on it. My 4 year old son also found a pill on the floor tin the second bedroom that turned out to be 200mg of ibuprofin showing it was not cleaned thouroughly before we arrived.

Reviews.Title: “It's too good to be true - but believe it!”
Reviews.Author: windsorchairs
Reviews.Content: We had the best vacation ever and while the Marigot is a condo, we had all the accommodations of a hotel. My husband's sister and her husband agree. The beach restaurant at the Clarion was a big part of our vacation being so much fun, we simply walked from the beach in our bathing suits and had the best lunches and drinks and then headed back to the beach. it's such a pain to have to shower/change from the beach to go out and eat and then to come back and get your bathing suits on. I want to bring my daughter and 2 gradnchildren down within the next couple of days. We won't stay anywhere else in Ocean City! Thanks for a great time

Reviews.Title: “FUN IN THE SUN!!!”
Reviews.Author: justbeachy2009
Reviews.Content: This was our 6th trip to OC, MD and we have always stayed at different locations. This was our first stay at the Marigot Beach Condos. What a great experience! The staff was very friendly, courteous. Upon arrival we checked in at the Clarion which is located right next door. We had booked two, two bedroom condos to accomodate all 11 of us. The check-in went very smooth and fast. In fact one of our two bedroom units was up-graded to a three bedroom unit so that we could all be within a close proximity of eachother and not on different floors. The units were on the 11th floor and the ocean view was breathtaking. We had patio furniture in both units which was nice to sit back and relax on or have lunch outside. The screen door was broken in our unit but, I did not feel the need to complain it was really no big deal. Our three bedroom unit was decorated nicely your basic hotel furniture but, it was very nice and clean. There were flat screen TV's in each room, extra blankets, pillows, linens and towels. There are hairdyers in each bathroom too. (great since I forgot mine). The flat screen in the livingroom only had two channels but, one call to the front desk and a replace was brought immediately. The kitchen and master bathroom in our unit could use a little TLC some of the kitchen drawers were broken and a little outdated and the bathroom needed some small repairs but, nothing we couldn't live with for 5 days. The indoor pool was nice but, only open until 9:00 pm it was nice for the kids but, my daughter looked forward to swimming a little later. The new Outdoor pool at the Clarion is awesome. Great for the kids and adults. It has a series of jets in the pool itself with a little shelf to sit on. Overall, our stay at the Marigot was fantastic. I never got the gentlemens name at the Clarion check-in but , he is soooo nice. (Thanks for the upgrade)! All of the staff at the Marigot and Clarion, (the check-in staff, beach bar, and maintenance staff are top notch! Anything you need they are there to help. If your looking for a great place to stay and are on a budget stay here and BOOK EARLY!. We booked in early March of 2009 and got 30% off our room. Plus you get all the amentites of the Clarion.

Reviews.Title: “Always have a nice stay”
Reviews.Author: neslaw1
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Marigot Condos for the past 7-8 years for a convention. As someone else said, the parking space numbering seems complicated. Quite honestly, it has become a game for us to try to find the space but after you find it, the space is always there for you. Not really a big deal. You should know that there is not daily room service because you are in a condo and not a hotel although you have all the hotel amenities. This is made clear when you rent. I rent condos all over the place and never had daily maid service. Great indoor and outdoor pool and great beachfront location. Outdoor grill is basic burgers, dogs, etc and drinks are cold. Rarely eat at Horizons, although the buffets that are served for the convention are excellent. This year our room was on the 1st floor so did not get the great view but the condo was clean and the furnishings are basic as it is used as a hotel and does not have the type of amenities your might expect if you were staying in an individual's home. One advantage for travelers who want more room than a hotel offers is that you can stay in a condo without staying a week. Not sure where else you can do this. All in all, I expect we will continue staying there many more times.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing stay at Marigot Beach Condominiums”
Reviews.Author: teezle
Reviews.Content: Firstly, this is a review of a 6th floor 1 bedroom, waterfront view room. As we knew, check in had to be done at the Clarion next door. The assigned parking for the place is a joke. You are assigned a number but there is literally no order to how the numbers are ordered. We had to drive around for fifteen minutes literally looking at each and every number in each parking space! Please also note that these rooms have no daily maid service. You can call the front desk and they will deliver toilet paper, tissue...etc. We go to the room and do our little "inspection". As soon as we walked in, we saw the closet to the right had a broken door and only one side was able to be closed (it was double sliding doors). The bathroom to the left had a broken doorknob that was hanging on by a screw. It did work and lock, just had to be careful we didn't pull too hard. There was also a persistent drip coming from the bath faucet that we could not stop. The kitchen was good with marbletop counters and plenty of space. There were a lot of utensils and dinnerware, make sure to wash them as they all were dirty. The little kitchenette table had all dirty chairs. We could see spills and dirt all over them. The main living room was good sized and had a pull out sofa and two side chairs. The screen sliding door to the balcony fell off when we opened it. When you slide it just do it slowly. The balcony had a great view. There was no table just two cheap plastic chairs. There was some type of industrial carpet on the balcony that was "pieced" together and patched. There were ants as well under the carpet. The whole condo had central a/c that worked great, problem is....the main unit is in the master bedroom closet!!! The door had a big screen opening in it for the air intake as well. It sounded like an airplane was in the closet. It woke us up every time it turned on and off. This is a totally unacceptable placement for it. When we opened the door, we saw a sign about not blocking the air intake on the door. Looks like others before tried to block it to help with the sound, haha!! The main bedroom bathroom did not have a shower just a sink and toilet, not a shower like the front desk booking said. The lock was funny and you had to pull the door really hard to close it. The amenites are average at best. We were real excited to try the Horizon's Restaurant next door with the so called "famous all you can eat buffet". Dinnertime I believe was 5-9 o'clock. We got there at 7:30. The place wa very empty with only like two other families there. All the foods in the buffet were dry. It literally seemed the food was out since 5:00. Very dry food and very high prices. We now understood why no one goes there. The service from our waitress was average. The pools between the two hotels were good. One was heated and inside. We had hopes in thinking that spending more money for a "better than average" place would guarantee us a good room, but this place was bad. I would not recommend this place to anyone or ever go back. Don't be fooled by the high prices, and the internet pictures. The pictures are of the "top of the line" corner three bedroom unit. Checkout was literally 5 seconds. I passed the key and she said bye. Seeing as I just spent all this money on this place and did not even get the obligatory, "how was your stay" or "hope you come back". She was too engaged in conversation with a fellow employee. Spend your money somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Nice with "issues"”
Reviews.Author: Hoosiergurl4
Reviews.Content: I went to Ocean city with my mom, sister, and two nephews (they live in MD I live in Wisconsin). We stayed in a two bedroom condo at Marigot. We were on the fifth floor with a great ocean view. The condo itself has a nice layout with the living and master bedroom having patio doors out to the balcony. The furniture was moderate at best...nothing more then typical hotel furniture. The windows were filthy...the screens on the patio doors were not on the tracks, and the lock on the patio door was a sharp as a knife. We were disappointed that what was coined as a fully stocked kitchen was not even close...there was not a large knife to cut meat...there were little to no kitchen utensils...five to ten lids with two pots...etc. This was a trip in which we looked forward to cooking favorite family meals...we were not able to do that without purchasing items for our use. In addition, we were disappointed that there was not a table out on the balcony...we had hoped to eat meals outside with the great view of the ocean. I saw while there that some of the units are privately owned and rented...that would be the way we would go next time, because the location is ideal...far enough away from the boardwalk to feel that you are away from the action and really on a weekend away.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME EXPERIENCE”
Reviews.Author: boysbirginia
Reviews.Content: The room was absolutely wonderful, the view from our balcony was breathtaking! Thanks for a great family get away.

Reviews.Title: “This condominium met all of our needs.”
Reviews.Author: ninny5
Reviews.Content: We loved the location of the condominium and the easy access to the beach. It was in a less crowded area than the boardwalk yet a short distance to everything we wanted to do. Having a washer and dryer to use was an extra plus. We had four children under six and we had plenty of room for them in the condo to unwind during our stay there. We had the three bedroom unit and booking on the internet made the cost really affordable for the average family. The staff was friendly and helpful; the pools were great!! If you want a nice place to stay, try the Marigot Beach Condominiums. We are already talking about a week's stay in 2010....

Reviews.Title: “Good Deal with Great View”
Reviews.Author: hersheytravel
Reviews.Content: Stayed in the condominiums with two 12 year olds, 19 year old, 24 year old and my friend, my parents stayed next door at the Fountainbleu. The condos are a better price for a larger party with the benefit of full access to the Fountainbleu restaurants and bars. The beach is really quite nice and easy to access. The balcony allowed for relaxing and watching the sunsets. Washer and dryer in the condo kept the sandy clothes to a minimum. Was able to drive to the boardwalk and there were plenty of handicapped parking spaces for my dad as long as you get up there early. There are two indoor pools available which keeps the kids happy if you hit inclement weather. The new outdoor heated pool at Fountainbleu was excellent. Gift shop in the Fountainbleu had pretty reasonable prices vs the boardwalk i.e. sunblock was two dollars cheaper, etc. but its hours were rather sporadic. Do the breakfast buffet at least once at the Fountainbleu, excellent. There's an indoor mini-golf around 76th street that was a lot of fun too. The fitness center offered two areas which were well suited to our needs with some excellent treadmills and a weight room. The two 12 year olds simply wanted to see the rooms and there was one rather surly female staff member who kept remarking and reminding us that "no one under 16 can use the center". Lighten up lady! Overall, it was such a relaxing vacation, you really didn't have to worry much about safety and felt okay letting the kids explore the resort. There was security and lots of staff who do a really nice job. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Ocean City is not what we thought it was”
Reviews.Author: VAWineLovr
Reviews.Content: The actual resort was the best part of the trip. The first day we sat at the beach bar awaiting our room and that was really the best part of the whole trip. The waitstaff was friendly and attentive. The prices on drinks were average for a resort area. The problem was that the rest of Ocean City is not as nice as the resort. The resort was truly a resort with restaurants, a private beach and other amenities. We encountered very expensive and low quality food, with poor service at the rest of the restaurants. Ocean City definitely seemed like it was for drinkers more than families. We enjoy our cocktails, but there were visibly drunk people on the streets at all hours. The resort was a good value, with a great view. The condos had seen better days, but it was tolerable for a weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: skullypuss
Reviews.Content: For our first stay in Ocean City, we chose Marigot and could not be happier. 4 adults, 1 child in Room 204. Master bedroom plus bath, 2nd bedroom plus bath, full kitchen, dining area and living room. Laundry room and plenty of closet space. The private balcony cannot be beat, looking right onto the beach. Clean, comfortable. Immediate early check in, no rushing us out at checkout time, nice quiet location also. There really was not a downside except maybe that someone had stolen the remotes for 2 of the tv's, but the front desk sent replacements up right away. By the way, all the appliances in the room were brand-spanking new which was nice. We were very pleased and would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Birthday”
Reviews.Author: wenniferd
Reviews.Content: For starters, I booked this place early like in winter and i got a great rate that ended up costing me more that 500 in savings. this condo was fully furnished, and they mean that, washer, dryer, dish washer, pots pans bowls cups plates and silver wear, even some cooking utencils. although all this was basic it more than served its purpose. the fousits were delta and the beds serta and everything was very confortable. we had an AMAZING view of our private beach and the board walk was a bus ride away (also very convient and fast) the only set backs, the water was still cold in july and the living room furnature had a strong sort of itchy material but we just threw a blanket over it and found the cushin to be very nice. I would recomend this place to anyone who wants a great time at the ocean and to have the ability to stay in a cook. I'll be there next year!

Reviews.Title: “Great time at the beach”
Reviews.Author: MDSoxFan
Reviews.Content: I was supposed to stay at the Clarion next door for a convention but they had a problem with my reservation- and upgraded me to a 2BR condo at their property next door- Marigot Beach. I travel extensively on business and it's not the Westin or the Marriott but it was great for the beach. Clean and well-equipped. Free wireless internet- 2BR, 2 bath great kitchen and dining room table for 6. 3 TV's plus full-size washer and dryer. Two double beds in one room- a king in the other. View of the ocean from a balcony that has a table and chairs for 4. Eat dinner with a beach view or sunrise breakfast. Private beach just steps away- and private outdoor deck with showers to rinse off the sand. Plus private pool and jacuzzi. Can also use the amenities at the Clarion for no charge- great spa and fitness area (sauna, eucalyptus, steam room) and pool- plus bars and restaurants. Assigned parking. Room service available from Clarion. New full size appliances (oven, microwave, refrig/freezer, dishwasher, toaster). Was much more space than I needed but would definately opt for the condo. Not sure if all units are like this- I was in unit 1111.

Reviews.Title: “It Is All About the View”
Reviews.Author: Likestotravelcheaply
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Marigot for five days last month. The carpeting had been removed from the living and dining rooms and replaced with a grey and white tile. The net effect was a look of public housing. Coupled with dining room furniture that was pretty old (paint stained and some chairs held together with screws) and one television that did not work properly and had to be replaced and this was a condo that left lots to be desired. In the kitchen, there was no frying pan at all. This is the second year in a row that this had happened. My husband and I did not do any cooking and so i did not call to ask for one. But how do you offer a fully stocked kitchen and no frying pan? One of the things I look forward to is dining on the porch. There was no large table on the porch when we arrived and I had to call housekeeping and ask that one be delivered. There were just too many things that were not in the unit which should have been. What it does have is a magnificent view of the ocean. Though we only needed one bedroom we booked two to have the master bedroom on the ocean side of the unit. Nothing like that great bay window view out to the ocean. The unit was very clean even though the bathrooms are dated.

Reviews.Title: “Old and Distuing”
Reviews.Author: facedc
Reviews.Content: I recently had a 2 night stay at Marigot Beach and was very disappointed. This building has seen better days old,dirty,discustingting. We had to change rooms and still were grossed out we had to clean everything ourselves. I would have left but it was not my trip. The evevator was scary . I would never stay there people had dogs, smoking was permitted. YUCK!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “It was ok...”
Reviews.Author: Jenne03
Reviews.Content: I came down to Oc for the first time recently. We came for a basketball tournament. My friend and I booked a condo at the Marigot. We had our two daughters with us. We got there a little early. It wasn't quite Check-in yet. So they told us the room wasn't ready . We went and got something to eat in the Clarion. The girls had a game that night. We came back to try and check in before the game. It was after check in time and our room still wasn't ready. It still needed to be cleaned. We went to the game and came back and our room was ready. We had a one bedroom with a king size bed and a sofabed room booked. We went in and it was filthy. There was food on the counter tops. It hadn't been wiped down. There were dirty dishes in the dishwasher. There weren't any sheets on any of the beds. The comforters were pulled up. The bathroom was disgusting. the view was great...but the balcony was dirty and disgusting also. We called down and asked to be switched. We had to get all of our stuff back out and go back to the clarion to switch out our key and get a new room. It was a pain. We did get a new room which had sheets and looked cleaner. So they did take care of the problem but we were inconvenienced. We had a great rate on this room due to the tournament...so I can't complain too much. So I say ..it was ok. I don't know if I would stay there again though.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Condo complex”
Reviews.Author: TomP882
Reviews.Content: We have been going to OC for 20 years. Have always stayed in the condo area in the 100's. We go down in the winter for a long weekend and look at units we want to stay in. This way, no surprises. We are staying in the same unit as last year, and this is our third year at the Marigot. We find the elevators (this is a big deal at condos) readily available. The indoor pool is a nice plus on a rainy day. Hot tub can't be beat. Of course it all comes down to the unit you are in. Ours has a nice firm mattress, well done interior. It is always neat and clean. We book thru Coldwell Banker, not the hotel next door. We bring our own linens and towels. Beach can get a little crowded in August, but that is the month we like the best. So, I go out early in the morning, stake my claim to a nice piece of beach, then go back up and have breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: taday4u
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two nights in a one bedroom condo. We were pleasantly surprised that the unit had one and a half baths. The half bath was in the bedroom and the full bath was in the hallway. The unit had updated carpet and tile on the floors. Because we rented through the Clarion Hotel, we were provided with linens and towels. They also supplied the bathrooms with shampoo, conditioner and soaps. Although the unit was nice, the bathrooms really could use an upgrade. The bathtub showed it's use with the hard water stains, but overall the unit was clean, spacious and direct ocean front.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: TravlerANJ
Reviews.Content: This place was great...Rooms were spacious, clean and very comfortable. We had two, two bedroom condos and each was great. If you get enough people to stay with you the condos are very cheap and you will enjoy it greatly.
